Module 3: Land and water representation in CLEWs modelsÂ¶

Learning objectives: By the end of this session participants will be able to: * Define different land-use types * Define demands for agricultural crops and products * Define basic technical and cost characteristics of agriculture/land-use technologies * Define water balances * Define water demands * Define basic technical and cost characteristics of water technologies
